Description: Crafts, Drafts & EatsThe Still, located in heart of the iconic Mirage, is the ultimate man cave with a dedication to craft beer, cocktails and mouth-watering food. A sports junkie haven, The Still features 27, 65" flat screen TVs and a comfortable 8,000 square foot environment perfect for cheering on your favorite team. Aside from a bustling center bar which features over 50 craft beers, the centerpiece and the heartbeat of The Still is Bud Bud_s, a refurbished Airstream trailer that has been turned into a fully functioning kitchen that churns out acclaimed chef Brian Massie_s unique spin on upscale bar food.
Location: 3400 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Catch The ActionExperience wall-to-wall action at the best Race & Sports Book on the Strip. The 85_ state-of-the-art HD projection screens features 24-hour sports and races at 4X the resolution of 1080p for the ultimate viewing experience.
Location: 3400 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
